name: All Jack'd Up!
description:
Take on the role of Jackie the first pumpkin of Halloween, as she goes through the neighborhood waking up her friends. Harness the power of candy to blast your way past obstacles, but watch out for the ghosts or you might get spooped to death! Light all four of your buddies to win!

This was made in 24 hours for Game Dev Knight's Big Spooky Game Jam, by a team of three developers that decided to work outside of their development comfort zone. We hope you enjoy!

Controls and Instructions:

WASD to move

Collect Red Block to use your melee attack and white blocks to use your ranged attack

Left Click: Melee Attack (Destroys trash cans)

Right Click: Ranged Attack (Destroys Leaf Piles)
